original_text: Behold, therefore, I stretched out my hand against you and diminished your allotted portion and delivered you to the greed of your enemies, the daughters of the Philistines, who were ashamed of your lewd behavior.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 내 손을 네 위에 펴서 네 일용할 양식을 감하고 너를 미워하는 블레셋 여자 곧 네 더러운 행실을 부끄러워하는 자에게 너를 넘겨 임의로 하게 하였거늘

sentences.original_text: I stretched out my hand against you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 향해 내 손을 뻗었고

sentences.original_text: and delivered you to the greed of your enemies,
who were ashamed of your lewd behavior.
